<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Dwarven Weapon Cunning](/Feats.aspx?ID=8) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Dwarf" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=54" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 37 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Dwarven Weapon Familiarity](/Feats.aspx?ID=2)

</column>

---

You've learned cunning techniques to get the best effects out of your dwarven weapons. Whenever you critically hit using a [battle axe](/Weapons.aspx?ID=16), [pick](/Weapons.aspx?ID=34), [warhammer](/Weapons.aspx?ID=47), or a [dwarf](/Traits.aspx?ID=54) weapon, you apply the weapon's critical specialization effect.
name: Dwarven Weapon Cunning
